That's how online business work.  But if it was at a local store, you won't necessarily have to show any personal information, but send payment from Cryptocurrency wallet to the business cryptocurrency wallet. That's where our innovation comes into place, you can send payment from a different cryptocurrency  to the merchant wallet,and our system take care of the conversion seamlessly.

Author: Orioinc
Title: ðŸ”¥[ANN][ICO]ORIO - MOST STABLE AND SECURE CRYPTOCURRENCY BACKED BY ZVR MECHANISM
Body: There isn't really a simple answer - we calculate exchange rates based on rates on other exchanges, as well as the market depth of the specific pair, as well as our own balances of coins (we hold an inventory of every coin, which is how we make the service so fast). Our goal, if three exchanges have three different prices, is to be somewhere between the lowest and the middle. Importantly, if you spend an hour trying to get a lower price elsewhere, the market is likely to have moved and you may have wasted both time and money.  Our algorithms are always getting better, and one of the things we work on constantly is getting higher limits per transaction and lower rates. Of course, these two goals work at odds with each other, for if we were to offer huge limits we can't offer a good price (due to slippage, which is a little counter-intuitive).  In all cases, as a user, if you are very sensitive to price and deposit limits, we recommend you use the Precise order instead of the Quick order. With the Precise order, you tell us exactly how much coin you will be converting, and this lets us calculate a better rate, and give you a higher limit.

Author: Orioinc
Title: ðŸ”¥[ANN][ICO]ORIO - MOST STABLE AND SECURE CRYPTOCURRENCY BACKED BY ZVR MECHANISM
Body: 100,000,000 millions ORIO TOKEN is the total supply and only 27,5 millions are offered for the crowdsale .

Title: ðŸ”¥[ANN][ICO]ORIO - MOST STABLE AND SECURE CRYPTOCURRENCY BACKED BY ZVR MECHANISM
Body: We built four major innovations for the crypto currency world:  Smart multi-cryptocurrencies  payment platform Our Token is back a very innovative mechanism called the ZVR ( Zero Volatility Reserve) that make it Volatility proof, therefore  the most stable Cryptocurrency in the world. We are filing a patent for this Mechanism We have the most innovative and secure wallet solution in the whole cryptocurrency world called 3 3SIG( Secure intelligent gate). Our wallet solution give ease of mind. in case  someone maliciously steals your crypto assets, our internal AI security detector will return the crypto asset to the original  wallet address. Our wallet is theft proof and it doesn't relay only on a private key. We are filing a patent as well. We also  solved the scalability and liquidity issues,by integrating the Raiden network and shapeshift,which will allow the ORIO network to process up to 1,000,000 Million transactions per seconds ( oppose to 5 transactions per second for bitcoin  and 20 for ethereum) and also larger than visa and MasterCard which about 2000 transactions per seconds  and seamlessly convert all cryptocurrencies.  Our crowdsale  is currently running till November  18th, 2017 at midnight. I hope this give you a broad understanding about the orio platform. Feel free to read through our whitepaper as well and reach out to us if you have any questions.  Whitepaper  Facebook - Twitter - Medium - Reddit  Bounty thread
